Specimen Type(s): Surgical pathology slides prepared from formalin-fixed paraffin embedded (FFPE) tissue
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for HALO AP Dx software aiding review, interpretation, and management of digital surgical pathology slides from FFPE tissue.
Indications for Use Summary: HALO AP Dx is a software-only device to aid pathologists in reviewing, interpreting, and managing digital images of scanned surgical pathology slides prepared from FFPE tissue for pathology primary diagnosis; not intended for frozen section, cytology, or non-FFPE hematopathology specimens.
